entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. A few rain showers beginning late this evening then changing to snow at times mixed with rain after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
